t: r/juggalo on Reddit: Best face paint I can find on Amazon?
s: May 16, 2022 - I don't remember if it is from Amazon or not, but my partner bought Wolf brand. It survives sweat and abuse better than anything we've used yet. The price is high to start at about 25 dollars per color, but we've done dozens of faces and used less than a quarter of the paint.
